summary: 1976  was a leap year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1976  was a leap year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1976th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 976th year of the 2nd millennium, the 76th year of the 20th century, and the 7th year of the 1970s decade.
